entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. Please wait while we connect you to a representative.
Ugh, finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. My name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
I bought a cycling jersey last week, and it's the wrong size. I want to send it back. What's the deal with your return policy? I'm not paying anything extra for *your* mistake.
I understand your frustration. I'm happy to help you with your return. First, can I get your order number please?
It's #VF12345. Seriously, though, I expect a smooth return. What’s the return window?
Thank you. Let me pull up your order... Okay, I see it here. You are well within our return window. The VeloFit return policy allows for returns within 30 days of purchase.
Thirty days... good. So, no restocking fee, right? Because this is ridiculous if I have to pay anything extra.
No, sir, you will not be charged a restocking fee for this return. Since the item is unworn and in its original packaging, you are eligible for a full refund.
Okay, and how do I actually *do* this return? I don't have time to jump through hoops.
I can help with that. We will provide you with a prepaid shipping label to send the jersey back to us. I'm generating that now. It will be sent to your email address associated with the order.
A prepaid shipping label? That's… acceptable. Will I get the full amount back, then? Seriously, I need confirmation.

Yes, once we receive the returned item and verify its condition, a full refund will be issued to your original payment method. You will receive a confirmation email when the refund has been processed. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account.
Alright, I think I understand. Just send me that shipping label, and hopefully, this will all be over soon.
The shipping label has been sent to your email address. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. You actually made this pretty easy, surprisingly.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
